name: Camp Clover
description:
-  Made in 2 weeks as part of my monthly challenge-  CAMP CLOVER

“They took everyone...I think I'm the only one left."

Camp Clover is a short, first-person horror exploration game. It’s an experience where every moment  has to be carefully considered in order to survive. Thirteen year old Cayna is about to experience the most terrifying summer camp of her life.  Collect incriminating evidence as you run and hide from your new camp counselors. Evade detection and work your way through the dark to find a way home.

Key features:
  • A nerve wracking, survival experience voice acted by Megan Lyons
  • Inspired by 'Give Yourself Goosebumps' interactive novels
  • A 15-30 minute experience that can be completed in one sitting
  • An experience that focuses on stealth and timing rather than action or puzzles
  • Haunting atmospheric music
  • An eerie environment that rewards players who like to hide in the dark
Controls:
  • WSAD - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Mouse - Look
  • E Key - Interact
  • F Key - Flashlight
  • ESC - Pause
